description.english: Complete an altar for the first time.
Purchase a rune for the first time.
Equip five pieces of an armor set.
Unlock the Book of the Living.
Unlock the Grimoire of the Life.
Unlock the Knowledge of the Hoarder.
Find a way to change background on main menu.
Find a way to turn on the lights in the Cemetery.
Purchase a tier II rune for the first time.
Purchase all the tier II runes.
Unlock the relic for difficulty modifier.

Complete the Cave on Herus difficulty.
Complete the Cave on Mythicus difficulty.
